name: In Metaverse Veritas In Conscientia Sanitas

metadata.name: The Fool
metadata.description:
With the swift development of the digital world, new enticing and intriguing information constantly emerge 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. No human being has enough capacity to absorb the whole knowledge and be a master of all. 

In order to learn, we just have to gather enough courage to embark on a new adventure to an unknown realm (cautiously) and, as shown in the artwork, having a support system and security —symbolized by the dog— would be favorable in keeping us from falling down a cliff.
